fixes.name: Delta Down USD 3M Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD 3M] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: This is a row-level multiplication of two calculated fields. Converted Tableau field references to the Power BI column reference format ('TableName'[Column]) and expressed the calculation as a calculated column.
